cbccore.sensors.vision
Class Blob

java.lang.Object
  cbccore.sensors.vision.Blob

public class Blob
extends java.lang.Object

This is the higher level Blob object that refers to each individual blob on the Camera object's currently processed frame. Use this in unison wih BlobList instead of the low-level API. This class adds several features to the low-level API such as finding the most logical continuation of a blob.

Author:
Benjamin Woodruff
See Also:
Camera
